  • 30+ YEAR EXPERIENCE in the Industry of Silica Gel Desiccant - Premium Quality Pure and Safe Silica Gel without Cobalt Chloride. NO RISK

  • SPECIAL THICKNESS - Packets are stored in bulk package - Air Tight Sealing & Sturdy Bag for Moisture Control.

DRY & DRY - OUR PRODUCTS 
• 30+ Years Experience in the Industry for Silica Gel Desiccant - See Our Customers' Reviews. 
• Dry & Dry Silica Gel is a Pure, Vitreous, Porous Form of Silicon Dioxide made from Sodium Silicate. 
• It is Purified and Processed into either Granular or Beaded Form. 
• Its High Absorption Capacity is Attributed to its Millions of Tiny Pores. 
• The Mechanism of Absorption is Purely Physical, with No Change in Size or Shape of the Particles even as They become Saturated. 
• Even When fully Saturated, the Material still Looks and Feels Dry.

entry.title: 5 gram X 55 PK "Dry & Dry" Premium Silica Gel Packs - 5 Humidity Indicator Card
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dry & Dry
Type: Desiccant, Moisture Absorber
Price: 10.99

30 Year Experience in the Industry for Silica Gel Desiccant - Premium Quality(See Our Customers' Reviews)

You are now bidding on 55 Packets of Brand new Fresh 5 gram Silica Gel and 5 Premium Humidity Cards

  

    • Packet dimension : 2" x  3"
    • Silica Gel Beads Size : about 1 ~ 3 mm
    • Silica Gel Beads Color : Clear White
    • Pure Silica Gel without Cobalt Chloride.
    • Packet Material is Special Fabric by Spunbond Technology for "Ultimate Moisture Absorption" & "Heat Resistance"
    • Packets are stored in Self-Standing High Quality Bag for Easy Storage and Use.
    • (5 Pack) Premium Humidity Indicator Cards(REUSABLE More than 20 Times) - Do not have in Direct Contact with Foods or Medications to be Consumed.
    • When you initially open the card, all dots sometimes react and change color because they are exposed to sudden humidity. If you wait for about 30 minutes, the card will calibrate and you will be able to read the humidity level. If 10% dot is pink and 30% dot is blue, and 20% dot is lavender, then the humidity level is about 15%. If the 30% dot is pink, it is time to change the desiccant. The humidity card itself is reusable. When the humidity level is low, the dots will change from pink to blue again. With long use, the color of the dots may faint. Then, you can replace the card. 

 

  • GOOD FOR GUN RIFLE JEWELRY CAMERA LENS SAFE MOISTURE PROTECTION

   Payment


We accept only Paypal and we accept all major credit cards through PayPal checkout.

entry.title: [30 Packs]5 Gram " Dry & Dry" Premium Orange Indicating Silica Gel Pack-Reusable
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dry & Dry
Type: Desiccant, Moisture Absorber
Price: 8.99

  • 30+ Year Experience in the Industry of Silica Gel Desiccant - Premium Quality(See Our Customers' Reviews) 

You are now bidding on 30 Packets of Brand new Fresh 5 gram Indicating Orange Silica Gel Packet.

 

 

    • 30+ Year Experience in the Industry of Silica Gel Desiccant - Premium Quality(See Our Customers' Reviews) 
    • Packet Dimension: 2"x 2.9", Easy to Read Orange(Dry) to Dark Green(Saturated).
    • Packet Material is Designed and Developed for "Ultimate Moisture Absorption" and " Heat Resistance for Reuse".
    • Packets can be Reactivated by Placing in the Oven for 0.5-2.0 hours at 200-250F Or Microwave for About 0.5-2 Minutes. 
    • (NOTE) Beads can't be Recharged in Original State. Beads may crack in the Microwave. Don't use over 250F in the Oven. 
    • Depending on beads' condition, they may take shorter than the recommended time. Please check the beads' color periodically and Let them COOL in oven and Microwave.
    • Packets are stored in RESEALABLE Self-Standing High Quality Bag for Easy Storage and Use - Newly Designed Air Tight Sealing & Sturdy Bag for Moisture Control.
    • DO NOT USE FOR FOOD AND MEDICATIONS.

 

 

Free Shipping

• Dry & Dry Silica Gel is a Pure, Vitreous, Porous Form of Silicon Dioxide made from Sodium Silicate. 

• It is Purified and Processed into either Granular or Beaded Form. 

• Its High Absorption Capacity is Attributed to its Millions of Tiny Pores. 

• The Mechanism of Absorption is Purely Physical, with No Change in Size or Shape of the Particles even as They become Saturated. 

• Even When fully Saturated, the Material still Looks and Feels Dry.

    • (NOTE) Beads can't be Recharged in Original State. Beads may crack in the Microwave. Don't use over 250F in the Oven.

 DRY & DRY - OUR PRODUCTS

• Dry & Dry Silica Gel is a Pure, Vitreous, Porous Form of Silicon Dioxide made from Sodium Silicate. 

• It is Purified and Processed into either Granular or Beaded Form. 

• Its High Absorption Capacity is Attributed to its Millions of Tiny Pores. 

• The Mechanism of Absorption is Purely Physical, with No Change in Size or Shape of the Particles even as They become Saturated. 

• Even When fully Saturated, the Material still Looks and Feels Dry.

• 30+ Years Experience in the Industry for Silica Gel Desiccant - Premium Quality(See Our Customers' Reviews).

 

    • Packet dimension : 2" x 2 3/4" 
    • Silica Gel Beads Size : about 1 ~ 3 mm
    • Silica Gel Beads Color : Clear White
    • 30+ YEAR EXPERIENCE in the Industry of Silica Gel Desiccant
    • Premium Quality Pure and Safe Silica Gel without Cobalt Chloride. 
    • ULTIMATE MOISTURE ABSORPTION & REACTIVATION - Packet Material is High Quality Coated Paper for "Ultimate Moisture Absorption and Heat Resistance for Reuse" (Place in the Oven for 0.5 -2.0 hours at 200-250F Or Microwave for About 7-12 Minutes at DEFROST.) 
    • FOOD & PHARMACEUTICAL GRADE - Even Our Packet Material was Tested under Strict Regulation for Food & Medication Specifications.
    • SPECIAL THICKNESS - Packets are stored in RESEALABLE Self-Standing High Quality Bag for Easy Storage and Use(Newly Designed Air Tight Sealing & Sturdy Bag for Moisture Control.)
    • Note: 5000 Packets are stored in box(Bulk Packaging)
    • These packets do not contain indicating beads and will not change color when they are saturated.
    • 100 % SATISFACTION GUARANTEED - 100% Refund or New Replacement BEYOND REFUND PERIOD if you are not happy with our product.(See Our Customers' Reviews-World Wide Best Seller) 

Free Shipping

 

DRY & DRY - OUR PRODUCTS

• 30+ Years Experience in the Industry for Silica Gel Desiccant - See Our Customers' Reviews.

• Dry & Dry Silica Gel is a Pure, Vitreous, Porous Form of Silicon Dioxide made from Sodium Silicate. 

• It is Purified and Processed into either Granular or Beaded Form. 

• Its High Absorption Capacity is Attributed to its Millions of Tiny Pores. 

• The Mechanism of Absorption is Purely Physical, with No Change in Size or Shape of the Particles even as They become Saturated. 

• Even When fully Saturated, the Material still Looks and Feels Dry. 

 

Clever Protection

• Guns, Ammo, Canister, Collectables, Jewelry, Passport, Camera Lens, Clothes, Shoes, Cosmetics, Books, Documents, Travel Bags, Gym Bags, Make Up Boxes, Silverware, Christmas Decorations, & Valuables

 

Clever Saver

• Wet Cell Phone, Cameras, Watches, Electronics, Shoes, & Windshield.

 

DRY & DRY - PREMIUM QUALITY

• 30 Years Experience in the Industry for Silica Gel Desiccant - Premium Quality.

• Our Silica Gel Packaging is the Highest Quality in the Industry for Moisture Absorption.

• Our Packet Material(PET Film) was Tested for Heat Resistance. 

• Packets can be Reactivated by Placing in the Oven for 2.0-3.5 hours at 200-240F Or Microwave for About 0.5-2 Minutes in Low Power. 

(NOTE) Beads may crack in the Microwave. Don't use over 250F in the Oven. 

Depending on beads' condition, they may take shorter than the recommended time. Please check the beads' color periodically.

• Place the Packets in the Middle of Rack to Keep a Safe Distance from Heat Source.

• You can Experience a Big Difference Compared to Other Products. 

• Products of Dry&Dry Guarantee 100% Satisfaction. 

• If you have any Problems with Our Products, We will give you a Free Replacement or Full Refund.
